name: GitHub Dark 2.0
description: Dark theme for GitHub - Switch off the lights on GitHub and browse GitHub in nighttime mode. For bug reports, open an issue or submit a pull request on GitHub. Alternatively, copy-pasta the styles from github-dark.css into a new userstyle. Be sure to specify that it apply to sites beginning with https://github.com/*.
